feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
